page.title: 10Leisure in N.W.Edinburgh
page.content: There are many parks but some parts of them are unusable due to{vandalism. When new facilities like swings and chutes, are installed in playgrounds, they are misused by a minority of people spoiling them for others. We are well supplied for indoor and outdoor sports like squash and basketball, football and golf, but we wish there was a swimming pool open to the public. We have a riding stable and horses at {Silverknowes}and a harbour at{Granton for{sailing}but the cost is high and most people cannot afford to use these facilities as in some parts of the area there is{unemployment.} One place free for everybody is the esplanade. Local people, and visitors from the caravan park beside the golf course, enjoy walking there. The air is clear and the view is brilliant.
